title: New information about the cyclable capacity fading process of a pouch cell with Li-rich layered oxide cathodes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22582-22586
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02472A, Paper

Jinhong Luo, Jinghao Liu, Zilong Su, Hangfan Dong, Zhimin Ren, Guohua Li, Xiaopeng Qi, Bo Hu, Wei Quan, Jiantao Wang
Based on the analysis of the evolution of key parameters during the whole cycle period, a new transition-typed fading mechanism is provided.
